title: One-Hour Reads for Daylight Savings
description: Daylight saving time ends on November 5. Spend your spare hour with a good book! These short reads can be enjoyed in a single sitting.

title: Fiction and Nonfiction to Read If You Love 'Lessons in Chemistry
description: It's hard to replicate the magic of this charming novel, but one of these books may be just the ticket for your next read.

title: A History of the Site of the Stavros Niarchos Foundation Library
description: A fascinating history of the site of the The New York Public Library's Stavros Niarchos Foundation Library.

title: Bewitching Romance Books for Spooky Season
description: If you're down for magic, curses, and other witchy vibes (not to mention vampires and ghosts), give one of these paranormal rom coms a try.
